706971f.title: Brooklyn: Surf Ave. - 12th St. W.
706971f.text:
Surf Ave., east from West 12th Street, showing in the right foreground, the (present (1929) Cyclone Roller Coaster, and also the Feltmann's eating
establishment.
NTE~~3EE0  About 1903.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.

706965f-a.text:
Surf Ave., south side, at West 12tk Street, showiag partially, at the right, Child's Restaurant, awd on te opposite corner the Brooklyn Trust Co.

706963f-b.title: Brooklyn: Surf Ave. - 12th St. W.
706963f-b.text:
(1)
Surf Ave., north side, west of West 12th Street, showing the Boston Hotel in the foreground, and Loew's theatre (8-story structure in the backgroundl.
October 1928.
Eugene L. Aimbruster Cellection.
(2)
The same, showing Loew's Theatre under construction.
November 1924.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
(3)
The same, showing the theatre building completed.
June 1925.
Eugene L. Armbruster 6ollection.

702526f-a.title: Brooklyn: 12th Street (West) - Surf Avenue
702526f-a.text:
West 12th Street, east side, at and north of Surf Ave., sho ing "Ovur the Falls". Note the B.W.T. train in background, at its Coney Island
terminal.
August 8, 1932.
P. L. Sperr.

706964f-a.text:
Surf Ave., south side, east of West 12th Stroet to Jones Walk, showing the extreme right, a portion of the Brooklyn Trust Co. Building.
August 1932.
P. L. Sperr.

706969f-d.title: Brooklyn: Surf Ave. - 12th St. W.
706969f-d.text:
(1)
Suef Ave., Morth side, east of West 19th Street, showiag Luna Park, wh ich extends to East 10th Street. This park was established, May 16, 1903, ky Thowpsoa and Dundy on 22 acres of ground, which increased to 38 acres in 1904. Frederick Thowpson conducted same, alone, at a la ter
date. Ia 1924, Barroa Collier was the ownr.
September 1926.
Eugene L. Arwkruster Collection.
(2)
Another view in the opposite direction.
January 1924.
Eugene L. Arwkruster Collection.
(3)
A view of the entraace.
January 1924.
EVgene L. Arwbruster Collectdoa.
(4)
An interior view of the park, undouktedly quite early.
About 1905.
Eugene L. Armkruster Collection.
